systemPhilosophy.core: 35 minutes daily. Non-negotiable. This IS your streak.
systemPhilosophy.rotation: Weekly variety. Recommended but optional. Does NOT affect streak.
systemPhilosophy.bonus: High energy only. No guilt if skipped.

dailyCore.description: Complete ALL 4 tasks = 1 streak day. Total: ~35 minutes.

A2.name: Pimsleur Audio Lesson
A2.description: Play first thing in the morning. Speak out loud. No skipping. The tracker will tell you which lesson.

A2.name: Anki Review (Review Only)
A2.description: Any deck. NO adding new cards. Stop at 10 minutes even if unfinished.
A2.instruction: Reviews only. Timer stops you at 10min.

A2.name: 3-Minute Podcast Segment
A2.description: Listen to ONLY 3 minutes. Do not pause. Continue tomorrow from where you stopped.
A2.instruction: Pick ONE source. Use same episode all week. Advance 3 min each day.

A2.name: 2-Minute Oral Summary
A2.description: Summarize what you understood. Use: 'C'était sur...', 'J'ai compris que...', 'Il/Elle a dit que...'
A2.instruction: Record yourself OR speak to mirror. Don't overthink.

B1.name: Pimsleur Audio Lesson
B1.description: Continue your progression. Currently completing Units 1-5.

B1.name: Anki Review (Review Only)
B1.description: B1 deck. Reviews only. 10 minute cap.

B1.name: 5-Minute Podcast Segment
B1.description: Increased to 5 minutes at B1. Same rules.

B1.name: 3-Minute Oral Summary
B1.description: Longer summary at B1. Add your opinion.

B2.name: Pimsleur Review Cycle
B2.description: You've finished the main units. Review random lessons from Units 3-5.

B2.name: Anki Review (B2 deck)
B2.description: Reviews only. 12 minute cap at B2.

B2.name: 3-Minute Detailed Summary
B2.description: Full summary with opinion and analysis.

weeklyRotation.description: One task per day. Optional but recommended. Does NOT affect streak.

Monday.task: Read 1 paragraph from any French text aloud

Tuesday.instruction: Write 3 topics you want to discuss + 5 key words for each.
Tuesday.note: If no friend session this week, write 5 sentences about your day instead.

Wednesday.instruction: Watch lesson. Take notes. That's it. No exercises required.

Thursday.instruction: Use today's Pimsleur lesson vocabulary. Keep it simple.

Friday.task: Shadow 1 minute of this week's podcast
Friday.instruction: Pick any 1-minute segment. Repeat 5-10 times. Mimic exactly.

Saturday.instruction: Continue this week's podcast OR start a new one. No summary required.

options: Catch up on missed weekly tasks

bonusTasks.description: High energy only. Add these AFTER completing dailyCore + weekly task.
bonusTasks.conditions: Only do these if you WANT to. Never out of guilt.

ankiNewCards.name: Add 5 new Anki cards
ankiNewCards.instruction: ONLY if you want to. Not required.

goFluentExercise.name: GoFluent exercise
goFluentExercise.instruction: Use sparingly. You have limited access.

readingPractice.name: Read full RFI or Le Monde article

writingPractice.name: Write 100-word paragraph
writingPractice.instruction: Journal entry OR opinion on a topic.

pimsleur.instruction: Listen while making coffee, during commute, or first thing. Must speak out loud.

anki.description: Reviews only. No new cards in dailyCore.
anki.recommendation: Use Clémence vocab deck OR core 2000 French deck

podcasts.instruction: Pick ONE. Stick with same episode all week. Advance 3-5 min per day.

clemence.description: Moved to Wednesday weekly rotation. NOT daily.
clemence.instruction: One lesson per week is enough. Quality > quantity.

gofluent.description: Limited access from employer. Use strategically.
gofluent.recommendation: Use once per week max. Save for specific grammar questions or speaking practice.
gofluent.instruction: Don't waste it on things you can get free elsewhere.

phases.name: Absorption Phase
phases.description: Focus: Input + consistency. Build the daily habit. Pimsleur + listening foundation.

phases.name: Volume Phase
phases.description: Focus: Increase input volume. Transition to native content. Weekly writing kicks in.

phases.name: Output Phase
phases.description: Focus: Active production. DELF B2 prep. Speaking and writing volume increases.
goals: Pass DELF B2 (or genuine B2 proficiency)

streakRules.definition: Completing ALL 4 dailyCore tasks = 1 streak day
streakRules.missedDay: Streak resets. No guilt. Just restart.
